【COOL GADGETS GIFTS】：Great gifts Ideas with exquisite tool bag made of oxford fabric and gift wrapping is the best friend gift or for your loved person on holidays.Cool stocking stuffers for men, valentines day gifts for men, birthday gifts for dad, boyfriend , women
【POWERFUL MAGNET】Maximum suction weight up to 5lb, easily find and grab lost items in hard to reach areas, helpful when working in automobiles, construction, HVAC and other home projects. Note: the amount of suction is related to the contact area and location of the absorbent article
【TELESCOPING HANDLE】Made from aluminum alloy, making tools shockproof. Handles extend up to 34.65inch, help to grab lost items in far to reach areas. Anti-slip, oil-resistant plastic coating and ergonomic design, provides comfortable grip and more effortless use.
【SUPER BRIGHT FLASHLIGHT】3 super bright LED bulbs, Magnet head and base, 360°swivel neck, 2.5lb maximum suction weight with extended 2″ stainless steel pocket clip help to illuminate and grab tools in dark narrow places.
【360° ROTATION ROUND & SQUARE INSPECTION MIRRORS】Made from premium-quality glass for perfect reflection, all-angled ball joint holds mirrors for 360 degree free viewing and keeps it from swinging, square mirror has LED lights facilitate inspection of dark areas.
【COMPACT PORTABLE TOOL BAG】Small size carries wealth of tools, easy to carry. Made of Oxford cloth, resist to wear and tear. Extended hand strap design, easy to carry and store. Additional pocket with hook and loop fasteners on the bag for gathering tools conveniently. Separate elastic band inside, help to organize.

KOOPOOL Magnetic Pickup Tool Set 5 Pack with Portable Tool Bag

  • SUPER BRIGHT LED Flashlight and LED Inspection Mirror：Super bright and 360 degree swivel adjustable LED Head.Great for grabbing small metal items in hard to reach spaces. This unique design can help you pick up easily.
  • Strong Magnet：The super bright led flashlight with 360 degree swivel adjustable head is equipped with magnet. The additional 2 pcs of Pickup rods make grabbing metal pieces easily.
  • Best Gift for Men or Women：This pickup tool set with exquisite tool bag made of oxford 600D fabric and gift wrapping is the best friend gift or for your loved person on holidays.

What is Included?

  • Telescoping Flexible Extensible Mini Flashlights(battery included)
  • Round shaped inspection mirror
  • Square shaped inspection mirror with LED head(battery included)
  • 5lb magnetic pickup rod(battery included)
  • 1lb magnetic pickup rod

Gift-Idea 3: KOOPOOL Universal Socket Tool

Color Black Black Pink Black orange & Black red
Material Stainless Steel Chrome Vanadium Steel Chrome Vanadium Steel Rubber + ABS
Socket Size 1/4″-3/4″ 1/4″-3/4″

Application Magnetic pickup tool :Great for finding metal nuts, bolts, screws, and other small metal pieces in the dark and narrow places.Super bright and 360 degree swivel adjustable LED Head. Great for grabbing small metal items in hard to reach spaces Universal socket set:designed to be used on most hex nuts, square nuts, hooks, crew eyes, tension screws, bolt heads, even worn and damaged heads suits standard 1/4in to 3/4in (metric 7mm to 19mm)fasteners. Universal socket set:designed to be used on most hex nuts, square nuts, hooks, crew eyes, tension screws, bolt heads, even worn and damaged heads suits standard 1/4in to 3/4in (metric 7mm to 19mm)fasteners. Magnetic work light:Perfect for indoor and outdoor activities such as: outdoor barbecue, car repairing, camping, and hunting, also used as emergency lights when power outage at home.

Product Description

Cool gadgets tool for mechanics, electricians, handyman, craftsman, engineers, DIYers to do some repair work.

The flexible flashlight is plenty bright enough for a tight enclosed space or dark working corner.Lightweight, strong magnets, good battery life.Small clip to secure telescoping flashlight to your pocket.No need to bend over or get up and look for a flashlight when you drop something metal.Lightweight easy to carry in purse, bag, car, basically anywhere.Extending magnet tool has a bending neck with 360° flexibility, and it will help you reach the awkward, cramped space.

Awesome New Addition for any Toolbox

You will get many cool gadgets!

Magnetic Telescoping Flexible LED Flashlight (Battery included)Square 360° Swivel Adjustable Inspection Mirror (Battery included)Round 360° Swivel Adjustable Inspection Mirror1lb Magnetic Pick Up Rod15lb Magnetic Pick Up Rod

360° rotatable square mirror with light

Round Shaped Inspection Mirror

Great Gifts for men! Special Holiday Gifts Guide:

Valentines day gifts for him husbandBirthday gifts for men who have everythingChristmas giftsFather day giftsStocking stuffers for Men / WomenThanksgiving day giftsUnique Gifts for Men & Women Who Have Everything!

Gifts for Men & Cool Gadget: Mens gifts for Dad, Husband, Boyfriend on Christmas, Thanksgiving Day, Birthday, Valentine’s Day, Father’s Day, etc. Men won’t know they need a magnetic pickup tool until they have! A cool gadget, unusual gift idea for men women who have everything. Unique stocking stuffers for men and women will be glad to add this item to their toolboxes.
Magnetic Pickup Tool Kit (5 Pieces): The kits includes 1 Telescoping Flexible Extensible Mini Flashlights, 1 Round 360° Swivel Adjustable Inspection Mirror, 1 Square 360° Swivel Adjustable Inspection Mirror, 1 piece 15lb Magnetic Pick Up Rod and 1 piece 1lb Magnetic Pick Up Rod.
Super Bright Flashlight：The super bright LED light has 3pcs super-bright LED beads to provide greater visibility in dark spaces. The telescoping flexible head with a powerful magnet can accurately pick up metal objects from hard-to-reach areas. And the magnetic base can be attached to the metal, free your hands, to illuminate the place where you need it.
360°Rotation Round & Square Inspection Mirrors: Telescoping inspection mirror is a good tool to meet your inspection needs, with a telescoping rod, the length of the handheld rod can be adjusted according to your needs, and it can be reduced to the smallest size after use, which is convenient to carry and store; the neck mirror can be rotated 360 degrees for easy observation hard-to-reach areas.
Widely Application: Could be used for finding metal nuts, bolts, screws, and other metal pieces; It’s easy to retrieve and pickup nails, pieces, small metal block and debris in tight spaces or hard to reach corners, such as behind HVAC appliances, cabinets, automobile parts, work benches etc.

Cool gadgets tool for mechanics, electricians, handyman, craftsman, engineers, DIYers to do some repair work.

  • The flexible flashlight is plenty bright enough for a tight enclosed space or dark working corner.
  • Lightweight, strong magnets, good battery life.
  • Small clip to secure telescoping flashlight to your pocket.
  • No need to bend over or get up and look for a flashlight when you drop something metal.
  • Lightweight easy to carry in purse, bag, car, basically anywhere.
  • Extending magnet tool has a bending neck with 360° flexibility, and it will help you reach the awkward, cramped space.

Awesome New Addition for any Toolbox

You will get many cool gadgets!

  • Square 360° Swivel Adjustable Inspection Mirror (Battery included)
  • Round 360° Swivel Adjustable Inspection Mirror

  • 15lb Magnetic Pick Up Rod
